name: Why BH ?
description:
Why BH is a casual - arcade game. 

You as weird looking hole on the ground must protect Queen from far far away land at all cost against the enemies by sucking them. 

Controller: 

[W][A][S][D] -> Move

 [ESC] -> Quit Game (Only after Game Over)

 [R] -> Restart Game (Only after Game Over)

 Left-Click the Queen to unleash nuke attack when Special Skill reached 100%

 

Assets from outside : 

Health Pack(Model) by Émile Bélanger (SketchFab) 

Fire(Model) by Edgar_koh (SketchFab) 

Imported Assets from unity store: 

starter_assets & ExplosiveLLC -> basic animation 

Standard Assets -> terrain material 

EffectTexturesAndPrefabs & SimpleFX -> VFX 

Game GUI Vol1 

Created by TimNuub that consist of : 

Fauzi Ramadhan Hermawan - 3D Artist - Boyolali 

Febryan Prasetyo - Game Design - Bandung 

Gerry Liman - 3D Unity Programmer - Jakarta 

Disclaimer : We are sorry that our game lack of visual and sound effect, we lack of member that master sound and visual management.
